channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The latest on the massive solar storm
item.description: A stunning aurora, caused by a severe geomagnetic storm, is painting the sky shades of pink, purple and green as it spreads into locations it rarely reaches Friday night. Follow here for the latest

item.title: America's debt tops $34 trillion, but commission to address it looks dead in Congress
item.description: A promising start has given way to challenging political realities for supporters of a bipartisan commission to tackle the federal government’s growing debt challenges

item.title: May 10, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Biden administration said Friday it is "reasonable to assess" that US weapons have been used by Israeli forces in Gaza in ways that are inconsistent with international humanitarian law — but the highly anticipated report stopped short of officially saying Israel violated the law.

item.title: WWII soldiers posthumously receive Purple Heart medals 79 years after fatal plane crash
item.description: The families of five Hawaii men who served in a unit of Japanese-language linguists during World War II have received posthumous Purple Heart medals on behalf of their loved ones nearly eight decades after the soldiers died in a plane crash in the fina...

item.title: Michael Cohen set to testify at Trump hush money trial Monday
item.description: Donald Trump's historic criminal hush money trial has wrapped up for the day. His former attorney Michael Cohen is expected to begin his testimony on Monday.

item.title: Federal judge temporarily halts Biden plan to lower credit card late fees to $8
item.description: A federal judge in Texas temporarily halted a plan by the Biden administration to lower late fees on credit cards to $8 that was slated to go into effect next week

item.title: May 9, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said US President Joe Biden made a mistake after the US paused sending a shipment of bombs to Israel so that they would not used in an invasion of the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Sam Rubin, beloved LA entertainment anchor and interviewer, dies at 64
item.description: Entertainment broadcaster Sam Rubin has died at age 64

item.title: Stormy Daniels wraps up testimony in Trump hush money trial
item.description: The testimony of adult film actress Stormy Daniels, a central figure in the criminal case against Donald Trump, wrapped on Thursday after the former president's lawyers continued their attack on her credibility.

item.title: Flooding in Brazil is set to continue through the weekend
item.description: The worst isn't over as flooding is set to continue through the weekend in Brazil, the governor said.
